SEARCH
Package org.example.oopproject1.service

Class JobService

java.lang.Object
org.example.oopproject1.service.JobService
@Service public class JobService extends Object
Service for managing job postings.

Provides methods to create, retrieve, update, and delete jobs, with support for pagination, recruiter company validation, and keyword-based search.

Since:
1.0

    • createJob

      public Job createJob(Job job, String recruiterEmail)
      Creates a new job posting on behalf of a recruiter, validating company match.
      Parameters:
      job - the Job object to create
      recruiterEmail - the email of the recruiter creating the job
      Returns:
      the created Job object
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if recruiter profile not found or company mismatch
